item.title: Typographic Design for a Miura Fold Map of San Francisco
item.author: hello@aentan.com (AenTan)
item.description: The map was inspired by a passage in Walter Benjaminâ€™s _Arcades Project_ where he describes a 19th century map of Paris known as the Plan Taride, which unlike the flimsy paper maps of the day, was a miniature fully-bound book. Content Highlights 38 spots around the city, including the best tea shop in Chinatown, a mini-park 11 stories in the air, a private library, and a bunch of amazing restaurants.
